funding-group.funding-statement: We thank the Wildlife Ark Trust for their funding of this work, as part of their overall strategy to develop a vaccine against squirrel poxvirus. ACD was funded by the Royal College of Veterinary Surgeons trust. KHK and PMM were supported by the The Danish Council for Independent Research/Natural Sciences. The funders had no role in study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript.
